jcr:content.jcr:description: Definisse™ revitalise threads promote long-lasting regeneration, added firmness and improved skin quality with a lasting glow - in both young and mature skin
jcr:content.jcr:title: Definisse™ Revitalise Threads
jcr:content.pageTitle: Collagen regeneration | Skin quality and elasticity

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title: Activate beauty from within with Definisse™ revitalise threads, regenerating your skin from the inside out.

text.text:
Definisse™ revitalise threads are the next generation of threads designed specifically for bio-stimulation and revitalisation. They promote long-lasting regeneration, added firmness and improved skin quality with a lasting glow - in both young and mature skin.

These threads smooth and firm the skin by stimulating both Collagen Type 1 and 33 production. Skin elasticity and hydration are increased resulting in a boost in overall skin quality. You will notice a difference in both texture and appearance. 

Definisse™ revitalise threads are simple, quick and relatively pain free - they are set to be your new go-to treatment for glowing and healthy skin. Whether you would like firmer and tighter skin on your face, neck or abdomen Definisse™ revitalise threads have got you covered.

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: What are rejuvenating and pre-juvenating threads?

text_copy_copy.text: Rejuvenation threads are a regenerative treatment that stimulate the skin to produce elastin and collagen - the molecules that keep our skin young-looking. Skin appears smoother and fine lines are reduced, refreshing not just how you look but also how you feel

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What are Definisse™ revitalise threads good for?

text_copy_copy.text:
We rely on collagen to maintain our skin’s structure and resilience to ageing. When we are young our skin naturally produces collagen keeping it supple and soft, but as we age the skin’s ability to replenish collagen naturally decreases by 1.0 % – 1.5 % per year - and this is what causes the appearance of fine lines and deeper wrinkles.2

Definisse™ revitalise threads improve skin quality by retaining and increasing collagen production - and in doing so - slow down the ageing process. Whether you’re young and want to maintain your youthful glow, or more mature and want to gain it back, Definisse™ revitalise threads are for you.

Our revitalising threads are approved for a number of indications:

As early as our 20s collagen production slows down and we can benefit from preservation of elasticity and reduction of fine lines. Sagging skin in the mid or lower face can be corrected in those of us a little older, e.g.45–65 years. Even crepey, sagging skin in the neck area when we approach our 60s can be improved. 

And best yet, Definisse™ Revitalise Threads can help us tighten and lift loose abdomen skin, yes you heard right!

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is a Definisse™ revitalise threads treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ revitalise thread treatments are even simpler than other types of thread treatments, taking literally 10-15 minutes. The threads are very fine and are invisible under the skin - you won't even notice the threads once inserted and positioned correctly. After just a few months you’ll start to see the benefits of rejuvenated healthy skin and a natural glow.

item_1723188303459.cq:panelTitle: How do Definisse™ revitalise threads work?

text_copy_copy.text: Fine synthetic polymer threads, similar to medical sutures, are gently and quickly inserted under the skin in the desired treatment areas. The threads then stimulate collagen production as skin tissue reacts to the presence of the thread – and over time, due to it’s biocompatibility1, the polymer-based material continues to generate collagen as it is gradually absorbed.

text.text:
Definisse™ revitalise threads stimulate both Collagen Type 1 and Type 3 over a longer time period (up to 18 months1) than PDO and PLLA threads (which only stimulate Collagen Type 1)3 and only last for around 6 months.

Definisse™ revitalise threads are the only revitalising threads to use P(LA-CL) material – extensively clinically proven through its use in our Definisse™ 3D lift threads [Internal link to Definisse™ 3D lift threads]. This is the newest thread material and the most advanced thread technology. 

The unique balance of durability and flexibility paired with the range of textures and lengths available make Definisse™ revitalise threads suitable for a range of applications, including delicate areas such as arms. And of course, our RELIFE Academy ensures that our aesthetic professionals are certified and use global best practice protocols.

title_1111695653.jcr:title: A range of threads for a range of treatments – and maximum comfort

text_1553609734_copy_732132601.text: Ideal for regeneration of the cheek area, addressing mature crepey skin, loss of elasticity and drooping.

text_1553609734_copy_1110049408.text: Longer threads are perfect for the abdomen area, and the tightening flabby, crepey skin and loss of elasticity.

text_1553609734.text: Cheek revitalising technique; addressing mature crepey skin, loss of elasticity and drooping.
Smooth threads allow effective treatment of the neck area to combat flabby, crepey skin and  loss of elasticity. These threads can also be used for abdomen tightening.

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: How can I increase my collagen levels?

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ revitalise threads can stimulate your skin to produce more collagen and therefore increase levels to those seen in younger people - to reduce the signs of ageing.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: How can I prevent ageing of the skin?

text_copy_copy.text: Signs of ageing of the skin are primarily caused by a reduction in collagen. Definisse™ revitalise threads can delay these signs by stimulating collagen production from within.
Definisse™ revitalise threads stimulate your skin to produce collagen by agitating the skin tissue, through both it’s presence under the skin and as it dissolves over time.

title_1657927442_cop.jcr:title: Definisse™3D lift threads can be combined with other Definisse™ products, to achieve the best possible results in holistic rejuvenation, for optimal well being.
Experience the ultimate boost to your skin quality, texture and appearance.

text.text:
Two complementary HA products work in tandem to reinvigorate your skin’s natural ability to regenerate and preserve its own youthfulness.

Definisse™ Revitalise Threads inserted beneath the skin stimulate collagen production to boost the skin from the inside, creating a firmer more youthful structure. Definisse™ Hydrobooster then supports topically using hyaluronic acid to promote deep hydration, fullness and brightening from the outside.

title_1657927442_cop.jcr:title: A revolutionary new product combined with a tried & tested favourite brings us an unprecedented treatment - Definisse™ Stimulate & Protect.

text_copy_copy.text:
Simultaneously enhancing the skin’s ability to both regenerate and prevent erosion of it’s own collagen, this is dual action advanced anti-aging protocol.

Definisse™ Revitalise Threads mechanically promote collagen creation and the resulting increased firmness.  Definisse™ KP1 magnifies the collagen production effect and most significantly protects collagen from degradation by counteracting the enzymes that cause it’s breakdown. This treatment helps to both preserve and increase the level of collagen in the skin.

title_1657927442_cop.jcr:title: Improve both your skin quality and facial structure in one treatment. The perfect partnership of both types of Definisse™ Threads brings us this ultimate solution.

text_copy_copy_copy.text:
Definisse™ Revitalise Threads boost the skin's appearance by generating collagen production and therefore protecting elasticity and reducing wrinkles.

Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads are then inserted to enable a simultaneous sculpting of facial contours preserving both facial shape and skin quality.

Skin is stronger, healthier, more beautiful and simultaneously repositioned to a more youthful contour.

text.text:
1. Wong V. et al. 2017. Hanging by a thread: choosing the right thread for the right patient

2. Reilly D. et al. 2021. Skin collagen through the lifestages: importance for skin health and beauty.

3. Kalyan R. et al. 2017. The Efficacy of Polycaprolactone Threads in Zygomatic and Mandibular Lifting: Consecutive Study from a Single Practitioner’s Experience.
